entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 07:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: ESE 27 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 near midnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
